Class RestEasyHttpResponseEncoder

java.lang.Object
io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
io.netty.channel.ChannelOutboundHandlerAdapter
io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToMessageEncoder<NettyHttpResponse>
org.jboss.resteasy.plugins.server.netty.RestEasyHttpResponseEncoder
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelOutboundHandler
@Sharable public class RestEasyHttpResponseEncoder extends io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToMessageEncoder<NettyHttpResponse>
MessageToMessageEncoder implementation which encodes HttpResponse's to HttpResponse's This implementation is ChannelHandler.Sharable
Author:
Norman Maurer
